--- In archive-crawler@yahoogro=
ups.com, Noah Levitt <nlevitt@...> wrote:
>
> PathologicalPathFilter does f=
ilter out repetitions like 
> /bla/?id=3D27/bla/?id=3D27/bla/?id=3D27/.
> 
=
> The regex it uses is this (with the default maxRepetions=3D2): 
> .*?/(.*=
?/)\1{2,}.*
> You can test it with this tool among others: 
> http://www.fi=
leformat.info/tool/regex.htm
> 
> Noah
